mapper.insert:
SELECT OFBOARD_SEQ.nextval FROM OFBOARD
insert into OFBOARD(BOARD_NO, EMP_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_DEL_FLAG, BOARD_THEME, BOARD_FOLDER_NO) values(#{boardNo}, #{empNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardHits}, #{boardDelFlag}, #{boardTheme}, #{boardFolderNo})
